WorkItem.Description: Need to document the SQL database schema!

Comments.Message:
Once you fire up Wolfpack with the SQL publisher enabled it will automatically create the database for you - so you can snick the schema then.

I can add the schema to the [publisher docs page](https://wolfpack.codeplex.com/wikipage?title=Configuring%20Publishers) if it would help? Looking at that page I would be inclined to break it into individual pages too whilst I'm there editing so you can link straight to an individual publisher.

Lemme know what works best for you

Cheers,
James
